y1 = 330.883
x2 = 616.759
y2 = 467.015
x3 = 156.587
y3 = 341.329
x4 = 211.576
y4 = 531.476


//compute 1-st equation odds
A1 = y2 - y1
B1 = x1 - x2
C1 = A1 * x1 + B1 * y1

A1 = 467.015 - 330.883 = 136.132
B1 = 436.933 - 616.759 = -179.826
C1 = 136.132 * 436.933 + -179.826 * 330.883 = -20.613

//compute 2-st equation odds
A2 = y4 - y3
B2 = x3 - x4
C2 = A2 * x3 + B2 * y3

A2 = 531.476 - 341.329 = 190.148
B2 = 156.587 - 211.576 = -54.989
C2 = 190.148 * 156.587 + -54.989 * 341.329 = 11005.178

//system determinant
det = 136.132 * -54.989 - 190.148 * -179.826 = 26707.574

det != 0
x = (B2 * C1 - B1 * C2) / det
x = \frac{-54.989 * -20.613 - -179.826 * 11005.178}{26707.574} = 74.142
y = (A1 * C2 - A2 * C1) / det
y = \frac{136.132 * 11005.178 - 190.148 * -20.613}{26707.574} = 56.242
